name: part_005
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Tokoyami Towa 2nd Live ＂SHINier＂【有明アリーナ】 [ZjuDUe4jnqE]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Slideshow of handwritten fan messages celebrating Tokoyami Towa's 2nd Live.
Attention screen with safety warnings and cheering guidelines.
Information screen regarding the second round of merchandise sales.
Wide view of Ariake Arena with the audience waving purple penlights, waiting for the concert to start.

subtitles.original: Attention ご来場のお客様へ: 演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください。声出し応援OKです。
subtitles.english: Attention Guests: Please be aware of flashing lights due to production effects. Loud cheering is allowed!
